OnCommandMsgs.msg: Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

OnPlayerConnectMsgs.msg: [GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Multi 1v1 Arenas  [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]!qs[NORMAL] to disable quake sounds  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Movement - BHop  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.  Type [RED]!help[NORMAL] to access the mode help menu.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Casual  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]10-Mans  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN].r[NORMAL] to ready up  [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]!qs[NORMAL] to disable quake sounds [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  Type [GREEN].start[NORMAL] to start or [RED]!help[NORMAL] to access the 10-Man help menu.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]DM  [NORMAL]Use the buy menu when you respawn without moving  [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]!qs[NORMAL] to disable quake sounds  [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]!gun !dm[NORMAL] command in all chat [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Deathrun  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.
